ygData.subject: RE: Basic questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve found lately that the only buff I need for my animation is a good fast dagger. At level 25, I normally travel with a lvl 30 druid friend who heals the pet
ygData.messageBody:
I've found lately that the only buff I need for my animation is a good fast
dagger. At level 25, I normally travel with a lvl 30 druid friend who heals
the pet in combat so I seldom lose one. Given that fact, I buy the daggers
from the vendors. You know, the ones that cost 2p and have a delay of 20.
Talk about supercharging your animation! Can't wait til level 29 when I can
give it 2 daggers!

> -----Original Message-----
> From: mstokes [SMTP:mstokes@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 8:14 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Basic questions
>
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Papa Legba wrote:
>
> > From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
> >
> > Do our buffs work on our animations? IE can I strengthen that cute
> > little 4th lvl sword I just learned how to summon?
>
> Buff away, I wouldn't think of traveling with my enchantment unless he
> was
> fully buffed (At your level I believe Haze and Strengthen are the only 2
> buffs)
>
>
